annotations:
FROM: ARYACORP PVT. LTD.
DATE & TIME: 28-08-2024 10:39:15   (GMT +5:30)
REFERΕNCE NO: 17754514
ATTN CHARTERING DESKDEAR SIR
GOOD DAY
DIRECT OWNERS VESSEL
PLEASE ADVISE SUITABLE CARGO FOR BELOW VESSEL
MV MING LE 2 -  (44K / 1999BLT) - EST OPEN CJK, CHINA  - O/A4-6 TH  SEP 2024 IAGW WOGGEARLESS. CIS OK
MV MING LE 2
TYPE: BULK CARRIER
IMO: 9207429
CLASS: IBS
FLAG: PANAMA
CALL SIGN: 3E6681
BUILT: 18th Jan-1999 / TSUNEISHI BUILDING CO.,LTD
DWT/DRAFT/TPC: SSW ABT. 44094MT ON 11.6M（Summer Load Water Line)/ 50.934
LOA/BEAM/DEP: 178.08 M / 30.40M/16.50M
GT/NT:  26029/ 15225
HOLDS/HATCHES: 5 / 5
CRANES ：NIL
SPEED/CONSUMPTION AS VESSEL TRADING AT OPEN SEA FOR 24 HOURS:
BALLAST: ABT 11.5KN ON ABT 17MT VLSFO (MAIN ENGINE) + ABT 1.8MT VLSFO(ONE AUXILIARY ENGINE)+ 0.2MT MGO
LADEN: ABT 11.0 KN ON ABT 17.5MT VLSFO (MAIN ENGINE) + ABT 1.8MT VLSFO(ONE AUXILIARY ENGINE)+ 0.2MT MGO
PORT CONSUMPTION:
IDLE:  ABT 1.8MT VLSFO(ONE AUXILIARY ENGINE)+ 0.2MT MGO
WORK: (Ballast/Deballast operation) ABT 2.0MT VLSFO(TWO AUXILIARY ENGINES)+ 0.2MT MGO
"ABT" MEANS AN ALLOWANCE OF +/-0.5KN ON SPEED AND 5PCT ON CONSUMPTION. TIME LOST/SAVED, VLSFO LOST/SAVED, MGO LOST/SAVED, IF ANY, SHALL BE ALLOWED TO OFFSET EACH OTHER. MASTER HAS THE RIGHT AND OBLIGATION TO CONSUME VLSFO OR LSMGO AT HIS DISPOSAL WHEN NAVIGATING/MANEUVERING/STAYING IN PORT (IDLE OR WORKING) IN ECA ZONE. VSL HAS LIBERTY TO CONSUME MGO WHILE MANOEUVERING, IN/OUT OF PORTS, STARTING/STANDBY OF ENGINES, NAVIGATION IN SHALLOW/RESTRICTED/BUSY WATERS,CANALS, RIVERS. THERE IS NO MIXING OF BUNKERS ALLOWED.
ALL ABOVE SPEED/CONSUMPTIONS ARE GIVEN FROM BEGINNING TO END OF SEA PASSAGE, AT OPEN SEA, NOT EXCEEDING SUMMER DRAFT, UNDER GOOD WEATHER CONDITION NAMELY, 24 CONSECUTIVE HOURS (FROM NOON TO NOON), NO ADVERSE CURRENT, NO NEGATIVE INFLUENCE OF SWELL, BEAUFORT SCALE MAX 4, DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3 (MEANS SIGNIFICANT WAVE HEIGHT LESS THAN 1.25 METRES), EXTRAPOLATION OF “GOOD WEATHER” PERFORMANCE FOR “BAD WEATHER” PERIODS IS NOT ALLOWED.
ALWAYS EXCLUDING ANY VOYAGE LESS THAN 48 HOURS TRANSIT TIME FROM SEA PILOT TO SEA PILOT, SAILING IN PIRACY AREAS, IN CONGESTION, IN REDUCED VISIBILITY, MANEUVERING OR SAILING IN SHALLOW/RESTRICTED WATERS, STRAITS, RIVERS, CANALS, WHEN APPROACHING /ENTERING/LEAVING PORTS.
THE VESSEL HAS LIBERTY TO BURN EXTRA VLSFO/LSMGO IN CASE OF EMERGENCY, EXCHANGING BALLAST WATER AT SEA, HEATING FUEL IN COLD WEATHER, HOLD CLEANING, MAINTENANCE, MANOEUVRING, SAILING IN SHALLOW/NARROW/CONFINED WATERS, STRAITS, RIVERS, CANAL, ENTERING/LEAVING PORTS, IN HEAVY WEATHER CONDITION AND WHEREVER NECESSARY. COST AND TIME (INCLUDING ANY DEVIATION TIME REQUIRED TO MEET SECA REQUIREMENTS AND/OR REGULATIONS IN OPERATION PORTS TO WHICH VESSEL IS BOUND) INCL BALLAST EXCHANGE TO BE FOR CHARTERERS' ACCOUNT.
CHARTERERS TO SUPPLY BUNKERS WITH SPECIFICATIONS IN ACCORDANCE WITH VLSFO (SULFUR 0.5% MAX) ISO 8217:2017 RMG180 AND LSMGO(SULFUR 0.1% MAX) ISO 8217:2017 DMA, IF ISO 8217:2017 NOT AVAILABLE, ISO 8217:2010 TO APPLY. BIMCO 2020 MARINE FUEL SULPHUR CONTENT CLAUSE FOR TIME CAHRTER PARTIES TO BE INCORPORATED INTO THIS CP.
ALL DETAILS ABOUT
PLSD TO HEAR.
BEST REGARDS,
Tonnage Desk:
PG-WCI-ECI - Rsea-Safr: Nitin Sharma | Mob: +91 9311255654  | Skype: mailto:acpl.nitindev@outlook.com
Seasia-FarEast: Carlton Carlo | Mob: +91 9311255657  | Skype: cid.971bb208b4e2c3bb
AS BROKERS ONLY
As Agents for Core Shipping Ltd.
